name: packwiz-spec
description: A format for specifying Minecraft modpacks, designed to be easy to manipulate with tools.

scripts.build: typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Pack --strictNullChecks -o schemas/pack.json --required --titles --topRef && typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Index --strictNullChecks -o schemas/index.json --required --titles --topRef && typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Mod --strictNullChecks -o schemas/mod.json --required --titles --topRef && typedoc --out web/ typings.d.ts --mode file --toc "Pack,Index,Mod" --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals

author: comp500
